modName: Cheat Script for Build Your Own Home
summary: These two files cheatmyhouse.txt and uncheatmyhouse.txt are two bat files that will add (and remove) all the building materials needed to complete the final configuration of the entire Woodland home created by supernastypants.
descriptionHtml:
These two files cheatmyhouse.txt and uncheatmyhouse.txt are two bat files that will add (and remove) all the building materials needed to complete the final configuration of the entire Woodland home created by supernastypants.

To use them, download with NMM or manually, and while you\'re in game facing the armorer bench at the building site (of Build Your Own Home) bring up the console and enter \"bat cheatmyhouse\". You\'ll notice building materials being given to your character. These are just the amount to complete one full house with all the additions.

If you change your mind before beginning you can either make a save before you cheat the materials or execute \"bat uncheatmyhouse\" which will remove the exact same amount of construction equipment as the other bat added.

Disclaimer:
Since this cannot be considered to be an actual mod, permissions to rely on supernastypants\' work were not sought. I have not changed, added, or removed anything from the original creation, and the materials added by this script are already available in the game world.
author: OperatingThetan
